name: Spinach and Raisins
keywords: gluten-free, vegan, vegetarian, raisins, spinach, side dish
recipeIngredient: 16 ounces fresh, loose spinach or 10 ounces packaged, fresh spinach

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and trim tough stems from loose spinach or wash packaged spinach.
Mince garlic, grate ginger and add both to hot oil in a pot. Add spinach and raisins; cover, and reduce heat, cooking about 2 minutes, until spinach is tender.
